Transaction Authorization: Instance Record
column4: Description

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: Reference to the customer requesting the transaction

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: The servicing resource for assisted customer exchanges

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: The type of product involved

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: Reference to the specific product accessed by the proposed transaction

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: The general type of action proposed (e.g. balance report, payment, change of address)

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: Details key values in the transaction (e.g. amount for a payment, dates for reporting, counterparties)

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: Reference to the contact record for the active contact where the transaction is sourced

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: The contact record consolidates all aspects of the contact that is cross-referenced by all  contact functions and called servicing sessions that make up the contact

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: The customer reference as provided by the contacting party and verified by the authentication function

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: The contact device can be determined by the channel operations facilities (e.g. URL/ANI-phone number)

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column3: Customer Contact Record Authentication Status (as obtained by SD-Contact Handler)
column4: The contact authentication level is determined by the authentication function and can be updated during the contact

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column3: Customer Contact Record Routing Selection Status
column4: The routing selections made through the contact

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: The requested service from a menu option can be indicated by the customer when initiating or during contact

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: The customer may provide details of servicing resource request when initiating or during contact

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column3: Customer Contact Record Servicing Event History
column4: Contact Handler can reference recent servicing activity for routing, security and servicing purposes (obtained from Service Domain Channel Activity History)

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column3: Customer Contact Record Servicing Position Reference
column4: Reference to the servicing position - can be where an inbound contact is routed, or the source of an outbound contact request

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column3: Customer Contact Record Servicing Resource Reference
column4: Reference to the servicing resource - can be to handle an inbound contact or the source of an outbound contact request

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: Records the actions performed during contact, including all dialogue sessions

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: Reference to any contact session dialogue records created during the contact - there can be several

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: The session dialogue log of actions is returned to SD-Contact Handler and added to the contact record

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: The general type of customer exchange (e.g. verified customer, anonymous contact, topic - used to structure/script dialogue)

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: In cases a prompt or script can provided to structure the interaction for self-service and assisted interactions

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: Reference to a dialogue log that is built up

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: The dialogue log, used for training and root cause analysis etc.  (e.g. click-stream, video/audio recording)

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: The mechanism for the session (e.g.. web, phone, chat, video, VOIP, face to face at a branch - note there can be concurrent sessions within a single customer contact)

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column3: Session Dialogue Record Session Start/End Time
column4: The start and end times for the session

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: The outcome of the dialogue (e.g. customer satisfied, on-ward routing, hang-up)

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: Records the start and end date times for the contact

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: Description of all actions performed during the contact, including all sessions

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: The interim result of the contact (subject to transaction approval)

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: Reference to a channel activity report extracted for the customer

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: The period for the channel activity report

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: The content of the report extracting recent channel activity records to support the transaction authorization decision

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: In case of failure, the guidance explains reason and details if additional information can be considered

Transaction Authorization: CR Interactive Transaction Assessment Instance Record
column4: Indicates success or failure or required increased authentication level to be acquired for authorization
